DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Effectiveness Levofloxacin Compared With Ciprofloxacin Patients With Chronic Bacterial Prostatitis
DOC.detailed_description: Prostatitis ( inflammation prostate ) common condition affect urinary system men 50 year age . Symptoms chronic ( long-term ) prostatitis may include urgency urinate , frequency difficulty urinate abdominal , pelvic , rectal pain . A frequent cause prostatitis bacterial infection , treatable antibiotic . This multicenter , double-blind study evaluate safety effectiveness levofloxacin compare ciprofloxacin patient chronic bacterial prostatitis . Patients receive treatment either levofloxacin ciprofloxacin 28 day evaluate treatment 5-12 day last dose study drug ( posttherapy visit ) , 1 month last dose ( poststudy visit ) . Patients contact six month last dose follow potential recurrence prostatitis . Effectiveness assess measure ability study drug eliminate bacteria cause prostatitis reduce sign symptom chronic prostatitis . Laboratory test presence bacteria perform throughout study visit , patient question relief symptom . Safety evaluation ( incidence adverse event , physical examination , laboratory test ) perform throughout study . The study hypothesis levofloxacin least effective ciprofloxacin treat chronic bacterial prostatitis without significant safety issue observe . Levofloxacin 500 milligram ( mg ) mouth daily ciprofloxacin 500 mg mouth twice daily 28 day
